title: Google\Cloud\Vision\V1\ProductSearchParams
name: ProductSearchParams
description:
Parameters for a product search request.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.vision.v1.ProductSearchParams

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.bounding_poly
params.description: The bounding polygon around the area of interest in the image. If it is not specified, system discretion will be applied.

params.name: data.product_set
params.description: The resource name of a [ProductSet][google.cloud.vision.v1.ProductSet] to be searched for similar images. Format is: projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/LOC_ID/productSets/PRODUCT_SET_ID.

params.name: data.product_categories
params.description: The list of product categories to search in. Currently, we only consider the first category, and either "homegoods-v2", "apparel-v2", "toys-v2", "packagedgoods-v1", or "general-v1" should be specified. The legacy categories "homegoods", "apparel", and "toys" are still supported but will be deprecated. For new products, please use "homegoods-v2", "apparel-v2", or "toys-v2" for better product search accuracy. It is recommended to migrate existing products to these categories as well.

params.name: data.filter
params.description: The filtering expression. This can be used to restrict search results based on Product labels. We currently support an AND of OR of key-value expressions, where each expression within an OR must have the same key. An '=' should be used to connect the key and value. For example, "(color = red OR color = blue) AND brand = Google" is acceptable, but "(color = red OR brand = Google)" is not acceptable. "color: red" is not acceptable because it uses a ':' instead of an '='.

methods.name: getBoundingPoly
methods.description:
The bounding polygon around the area of interest in the image.

If it is not specified, system discretion will be applied.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.vision.v1.BoundingPoly bounding_poly = 9;

methods.description:

If it is not specified, system discretion will be applied.

Format is: projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/LOC_ID/productSets/PRODUCT_SET_ID.

methods.name: getProductCategories
methods.description:
The list of product categories to search in. Currently, we only consider the first category, and either "homegoods-v2", "apparel-v2", "toys-v2", "packagedgoods-v1", or "general-v1" should be specified. The legacy categories "homegoods", "apparel", and "toys" are still supported but will be deprecated. For new products, please use "homegoods-v2", "apparel-v2", or "toys-v2" for better product search accuracy. It is recommended to migrate existing products to these categories as well.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string product_categories = 7;

methods.name: getFilter
methods.description:
The filtering expression. This can be used to restrict search results based on Product labels. We currently support an AND of OR of key-value expressions, where each expression within an OR must have the same key. An '=' should be used to connect the key and value.

For example, "(color = red OR color = blue) AND brand = Google" is acceptable, but "(color = red OR brand = Google)" is not acceptable. "color: red" is not acceptable because it uses a ':' instead of an '='.

Generated from protobuf field string filter = 8;
